title: Only level 5 or higher should be played in ranked
body: People shouldn't be able to freaking play ranked with champs that they don't have at level 5 mastery or higher. Dumbass idiots go to ranked to fucking try out a champ and just fucking feed and troll. We should have the ability to report people for fucking sucking ass.

replies.body: People can suck ass on a champion even with a level 7 mastery, while some people are good with a level 2 mastery. It doesn't mean anything.
You should only be able to log on to League if you have level 7 mastery on every champion
lol how would that work... cant log on unless you have lvl 7 on all 134 champs ?
exactly, every problem is solved if no one can play the game

This would mean absolutely nothing, mastery is zero indication of skill or game knowledge.
Kind of interesting how you seem to have dropped from high silver to bronze IV while playing only mastery 5+ champions.
